publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7824 Bill Butler: Good Luck to Andy Murray—That the Parliament congratulates Scotland’s Andy Murray on reaching the final of the Australian Open; wishes him all the best for Sunday’s match against Novak Djokovic,and hopes for the first Scottish victory in a Grand Slam tournament since 1896.

S3M-7824 Good Luck to Andy Murray (lodged on 28 January 2011) Dr Richard Simpson*, Pauline McNeill*, Robin Harper*, Nanette Milne*, Rob Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Jackie Baillie*, Margaret Mitchell*, Cathy Peattie*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stewart Maxwell*, Marlyn Glen*, Jim Hume*, Jamie McGrigor*, Claire Baker*, Patricia Ferguson*
S3M-7824 Good Luck to Andy Murray (lodged on 28 January 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
